Package ai.steeringbehaviors.orientation

Class Face

java.lang.Object
ai.steeringbehaviors.orientation.Align
ai.steeringbehaviors.orientation.Face
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviors
Direct Known Subclasses:
Wander
public class Face
extends Align
This object will turn the targets orientation to match the current velocity. The new Orientation is passed to Align which will allow the agent to turn
